oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songs of Sorrow and Salvation
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Concert tours; Gauthier, Mary; Jones, Diana;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (gray on light brown) announcing Songs of Sorrow and Salvation from the American South album tour with Mary Gauther and Diana Jones. Poster features a woodcut of a bird.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Julie Marie Sola
